document_data.name: Sharandar
document_data.mainbody: '''Sharandar''' was an ancient [[elf|elven]] keep lost within the [[Neverwinter Wood]] near the village of [[Conyberry]].
document_data.Structure: There were rumors that Sharandar was hidden under living trees within the forest.
document_data.History:
Long ago, the fortress was abandoned by the elves who marched forth to fight the growing [[orc]] hordes, and were never seen again.

Around [[1479 DR]], [[eladrin]] descendants of the empire of [[Illefarn]], led by the fey knight [[Merrisara Winterwhite]] were attempting to restore the ruins of Sharandar, and by extension all of the empire of [[Iliyanbruen]], by making incursions into Neverwinter Wood through a [[portal]] from the [[Feywild]] located within the Feywild city of [[New Sharandar]].<ref>
